definition: to repair/to patch/to mend/to make up for/to fill (a vacancy)/to supplement
to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)

sentences.english: I hope to recapture those two lost years of my life.
sentences.chinese: 我希望補回我那兩年失去的時光。
